Summary: observed lights hovering above trees at intersection. as I drove closer, lights faded out and disappeard aprox 20-30ft.above me.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving home from work at 9:30pm. As I drove up Wyman st heading north I observed lights that appeared to be too low to be a plane. As I approached the intersection I observed the lights were just above the trees and seemed to be floating in a sort of mist or fog that was just arround the lights. There was no sound coming from it. When I was about 30 ft away the light faded out very quickly and it was gone. I was talking to a colleague from work at the time on my phone. I was really freaked out and had to pull over because my heart was racing and I couldn't stop shaking.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Waltham
There were no other sightings in Waltham on or around August 29th 2013
